item.title: Another compile error =p
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

java you do know when it says an error in the bank thing. you forgot to add a closing } on one of your codes. go back and find your most recent things you edited. and for each { you should have a } in the code for the most part. i hope you know what i mean.

if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else

}
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					} else {[/code]
